title: neccadiru bekku
sahitya:
neccadiru bekku neva nODuttide


caraNam 1    ombhattu bAgila panjaravanadide kambhavilla kadavu modale illa 
embhattu sAvira sandu gaNTina gUDa nambi nI keDadiro elo rAmuga
    caraNam 2    munivaru javaru mOhisuvarAru mandi mana kAku gOnisuvareNTu mandi 
inidu tiLidu hindu mundu vicArisi manameTTi keDadiro elo rAmuga
    caraNam 3    sati sutarige matte hitarige bEkemba ati lObhatana bEDvelo rAmuga 
kSiti sureremba bhUmili bitti mundaNa pathake sAdhana mADiko rAmuga
    caraNam 4    honnu heNNu maNNu emba mOhadoLiddu baNNa keDalu bEDa elo rAmuga 
saNNava suDuvante bekku ninna kaNNu teredeccattirelo rAmug
    caraNam 5    sthiravendu neccadiru I panjaravanu nI uravaNisuta bekku mereyutide 
parama krpALu shrI purandara viTTalana nere nambi sukhiyAgirelo rAmuga
